summary: Adds Spells of all classes, plus staves, and alters a few perks. These Spells are for those who want to become a stronger magic user
descriptionHtml:
Adds Various Spells, including new damage spells for all spell skills.

Alteration:

Novice: Slow-Vex (Damage Health + Damage Weapon Speed)

Apprentice: Fortify Battle (Weapon Speed + Damage Resist)
                 Fortify Carry Weight
                 Fortify Speed
                 Fortify Unarmed Damage
                 Lock [WIP]
                 Open [WIP]
                 Wabbajack Spell
                 Illuminate (Custom Light)

Adept: Majunta Armor (Mage Armor against Magic)
          Water Walking [WIP]

Expert:Fortify More Shouts
          Fortify More Speed

Master: Fortify More Battle
           Fortify More Carry Weight
           Fortify More Unarmed Damage


Conjuration:

Novice: Conjure Wisper (a custom Wispmother) [OP]
           Conjure Staggert (a White Stag)
           Conjure Mudcrab
           Conjure Skeleton Mage

Apprentice: Conjure Dwarven Sphere
                 Conjure Giant Youth
                 Spectral Arrow
                 Conjure Corrupt Shade

Adept: Conjure Bear Cub
          Conjure Mini Mammoth
          Conjure Frost Troll Infant
          Conjure Werewolf Pup [WIP]
          Conjure Snow Sabercat Kitten
          Conjure Mini Giant
          Conjure Altmer Mage
          Conjure Bosmer Ranger
          Conjure Dunmer Bandit
          Conjure Imperial Legoniar
          Conjure Khajiit Blade
          Conjure Stormcloak Nord
          Conjure Orc Warrior
          Conjure Redguard Knight
          Conjure Young Forsworn
          Conjure Young Sheogorath
          Conjure Corrupted Skeleton
           

Expert: Conjure Chaurus Reaper (enlarged)
           Conjure Hagraven (enlarged)
           Conjure Snow Dragon (enlarged)
           Conjure Lesser Elk (Stronger, but smaller)
           Conjure Icewraith Greater
           Conjure Slaughterfish Greater
           Conjure Hype Draugr
           Conjure Hype Falmer
           Conjure Dragon Priest
           Conjure Sheogorath
           Conjure Avos Aron
           Many More!!!!!

Master: Wisper Thrall
           Dwarven Sphere Thrall
           Frost Troll Infant Thrall
           Hype Draugr Thrall
           Hype Falmer Thrall


Destruction:

Novice: Dedragon (Dragon Rend + Damage Shouts) [WIP]
           Poison Cobweb

Apprentice: Slaven
                 Venom Cobweb

Adept: Depleter Cobweb
          Depleter Slaven

Expert: Voyage Cobweb
           Voyage Slaven

Master: Leechor Cobweb
           Leechor Slaven




Illusion:

Novice: Disillusion (Damage Health + Lower Damage Resistance)

Apprentice: Verth (Blind + Mood)
                 Debuff (Blind + Damage Speed)
                 Bliv (Blind + Paralysis)
                 Lesser Command Animal Dart

Adept: Demodulate (Lower Mass + Lower Damage Reflection)
          Devu (Blind + Aggression)
          Vonu (Dragon Rend + Damage Health)
          Command Animal Dart

Expert: Terra Rift (Blind + Damage Armor Rating)
           Dessence (Damage Critical Chance + Damage Health)
           Greater Command Animal Dart

Master: Animal Master Control Dart
           Major Bliv


Restoration:

Novice: Absorb Mana
           Absorb HP
           Absorb SP

Apprentice: Absorb One-Handed
                 Absorb Two-Handed
                 Absorb Archery
                 Absorb Destruction
                 Absorb Illusion
                 Absorb Alteration
                 Absorb Restoration
                 Absorb Block
                 Absorb Heavy Armor
                 Absorb Light Armor
                 Cure Disease
                 Cure Poison

Adept: Absorb Conjuration
          Absorb Lockpicking (Non-Hostile)
          Absorb Pickpocket (Non-Hostile)
          Absorb Sneak (Non-Hostile)

Expert: Absorb Alchemy (Non-Hostile)
           Absorb Enchanting (Non-Hostile)
           Absorb Smithing (Non-Hostile)
           Absorb Speech (Non-Hostile)

Master: Absorb Essence (HP + SP + Mana)
           Absorb Magic (Destruction + Illusion + Alteration + Restoration + Conjuration)
           Absorb Combat (Heavy Armor + One-Handed + Two-Handed + Archery + Block)
           Absorb Stealth (Light Armor + Lockpicking + Pickpocket + Sneak + Speech)
           Absorb Crafting (Smithing + Alchemy + Enchanting - Non-Hostile)

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

Staves for a more powerful mage have been added.

Staff of Elements
Staff of Dedragon
Staff of Cobwebs
Staff of Slaven
Staff of the Dragon Priest
Staff of Animal Command Dart
Staff of Essence Absorbtion

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

Perks were altered for a stronger mage, as well.

Twin Souls changed to Hex (6) Souls

Destruction Novice to Master perks power up spell damage, enchants, potions, food, and healing

Green Thumb Allows 4 per Gathering

Extra Effects allows up to 4 enchantments
author: KonoVeres
